claim_summary: During a review of Arkansas Department of Human Services (DHS) administrative rules, press releases and federal filings for FY‑2026, no compliance determinations were identified.  Searches of DHS’s official website and federal guidance documents yielded operational announcements and appropriation acts but no FY‑2026 compliance determinations.

source.title:
Extensive searches of DHS’s website and federal guidance documents (e.g., the section 1115 demonstration approval
letter) reveal operational guidance but no compliance determinations or enforcement ac
